quest.name: A Test of Mettle
journal:
 Quest Sync
The brawny Loporrit wants to see how tough you really are.
objectives: Speak with the brawny Loporrit and defeat the mankind checker.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: My, what impeccable timing. I was hoping you might stop by.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: As you well know by now, these facilities were built to meet any and all needs your people might have. However, you're not at all what we expected, and I don't mean just your exceedingly diminutive stature. A great number of changes must be made, including to our sentry drones.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: We have no frame of reference for what may pose a threat to your kind, and I believe a better understanding of your strength may enlighten us.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: Not just your physical strength, mind, but your strategic prowess as well, which is why I'd like to see how you fare in a fight. What do you say?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: Wonderful! If you could meet me in Greatest Endsvale, I'll see that everything is ready when you get there.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: Let's get started, shall we? Activating terminal one. Begin data acquisition!

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: You certainly have a knack for battle. I can hardly imagine how strong your enemies must be. All the more reason our sentries are in serious need of improvements. Now, might I trouble you for one more test?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: That's the spirit! I can't imagine you'll have much trouble after seeing that first display, but one can never have too much data. Let's try one of our drones from terminal two.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: That was incredible. You haven't been sneaking any iron carrots, have you? I had no idea your kind were so fearsome in battle.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: Maybe we should forget the sentries and have you guard Bestways Burrow. I jest, I jest─we would never dream of putting you or your people in harm's way.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: I want to thank you properly, but not here. Let's head back to the main plaza.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: The moon will be as safe as safe can be once the drones are refurbished, and thanks to you, I have all the data I could ask for.

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: Though I did read something a touch concerning in one of the books our collaborators sent us. Something about certain drinks you imbibe that make you a threat to yourselves and everyone around you...? I hope our drones will be prepared for such an emergency...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITSA04247
dialogue.text: At any rate, I better get back to work. It's not much, but I'd like you to have this─a small token of thanks for your help.
